overview: “2048: Nowhere to Run” takes place one year before the events of Blade Runner 2049. The short film focuses on Sapper, a man who is trying to make it through life day-by-day without turning back to his old ways. We’re introduced to both the gentle nature of Sapper and the violence he’s capable of when set off.
cast: Dave Bautista|Björn Freiberg|Adam Savage|Gérard Miller|Gaia Ottman
